| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | [EvilHack 0.8.3 - monst.c, line 357](https://github.com/k21971/EvilHack/blob/v0.8.3/src/monst.c#L357) |

**Koa**, d, is a [unique](/wiki/Unique "Unique") [monster](/wiki/Monster "Monster") that appeared in [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"). She was a [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong"), [carnivorous](/wiki/Carnivorous "Carnivorous") [canine](/wiki/Canine "Canine") that could be seen via [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision"), and had the ability to go [berserk](/wiki/Berserk_\(EvilHack\) "Berserk (EvilHack)") when at low HP. She acted as one of the loyal companions of [Kathryn the Ice Queen](/wiki/Kathryn_the_Ice_Queen "Kathryn the Ice Queen") alongside [Ozzy](/wiki/Ozzy "Ozzy"): attacking Kathryn would cause Koa and Ozzy to become hostile, and defeating Kathryn and breaking her curse would pacify both Koa and Ozzy. [Bourbon](/wiki/Bourbon "Bourbon") follows in Koa's footsteps as one of Kathryn's guardians.

Koa had a strong bite attack and a claw attack, and possessed [sleep resistance](/wiki/Sleep_resistance "Sleep resistance"), [cold resistance](/wiki/Cold_resistance "Cold resistance") and [stoning resistance](/wiki/Stoning_resistance "Stoning resistance").

Koa's passing is memorialized with a special [headstone](/wiki/Headstone "Headstone") on the last floor of the [Ice Queen's Realm](/wiki/Ice_Queen%27s_Realm "Ice Queen's Realm"), placed next to Kathryn within the castle's innermost room.

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 Generation](#Generation)
- [2 Origin](#Origin)
- [3 Encyclopedia entry](#Encyclopedia_entry)
- [4 References](#References)

## Generation

Koa generated as peaceful. She was always generated in the [Ice Queen's Realm](/wiki/Ice_Queen%27s_Realm "Ice Queen's Realm"), occupying the square north of the upper fountain (which represented her "water bowl") at level creation.

Koa would revive at full HP and turn peaceful upon defeat.

## Origin

Koa is based on the [EvilHack developer's](/wiki/User:K2 "User:K2") beloved German Shepherd dog who passed away on November 29th, 2020, as indicated by the [encyclopedia](/wiki/Encyclopedia "Encyclopedia") entry. In 2019, the developer promised his then-seven-year-old daughter Kathryn that he would add her and their dogs to EvilHack, and made them the bosses of a special branch.[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)

## Encyclopedia entry

I am your friend, your partner,  
Your defender, your dog.  
You are my life, my leader.  
I will be yours, faithful and true,  
To the last beat of my heart.  
I am the German Shepherd.  
\[ Author unknown ]  
  
Koa: July 25th, 2009 - November 29th, 2020  
Ozzy: January 13th, 2015 - present  
Bourbon: April 19th, 2016 - present

## References

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [New branch: The Ice Queen's Realm.](https://github.com/k21971/EvilHack/commit/113aae435bc8823acc978097f99a19aaf9f3b2b1)

  • has infravision.
Reference EvilHack 0.8.3 - monst.c, line 357

Koa, d, is a unique monster that appeared in EvilHack. She was a strong, carnivorous canine that could be seen via infravision, and had the ability to go berserk when at low HP. She acted as one of the loyal companions of Kathryn the Ice Queen alongside Ozzy: attacking Kathryn would cause Koa and Ozzy to become hostile, and defeating Kathryn and breaking her curse would pacify both Koa and Ozzy. Bourbon follows in Koa's footsteps as one of Kathryn's guardians.

Koa had a strong bite attack and a claw attack, and possessed sleep resistance, cold resistance and stoning resistance.

Koa's passing is memorialized with a special headstone on the last floor of the Ice Queen's Realm, placed next to Kathryn within the castle's innermost room.

Contents

  • 2 Origin
  • 3 Encyclopedia entry
  • 4 References

Generation

Koa generated as peaceful. She was always generated in the Ice Queen's Realm, occupying the square north of the upper fountain (which represented her "water bowl") at level creation.

Koa would revive at full HP and turn peaceful upon defeat.

Origin

Koa is based on the EvilHack developer's beloved German Shepherd dog who passed away on November 29th, 2020, as indicated by the encyclopedia entry. In 2019, the developer promised his then-seven-year-old daughter Kathryn that he would add her and their dogs to EvilHack, and made them the bosses of a special branch.[1]

You are my life, my leader.
I will be yours, faithful and true,
To the last beat of my heart.
I am the German Shepherd.
[ Author unknown ]

Koa: July 25th, 2009 - November 29th, 2020
Ozzy: January 13th, 2015 - present
Bourbon: April 19th, 2016 - present

'''Koa''', {{brown|d}}, is a [[unique]] [[monster]] that appeared in [[EvilHack]]. She was a [[strong]], [[carnivorous]] [[canine]] that could be seen via [[infravision]], and had the ability to go [[Berserk (EvilHack)|berserk]] when at low HP. She acted as one of the loyal companions of [[Kathryn the Ice Queen]] alongside [[Ozzy]]: attacking Kathryn would cause Koa and Ozzy to become hostile, and defeating Kathryn and breaking her curse would pacify both Koa and Ozzy. [[Bourbon]] follows in Koa's footsteps as one of Kathryn's guardians.

Koa had a strong bite attack and a claw attack, and possessed [[sleep resistance]], [[cold resistance]] and [[stoning resistance]].

Koa's passing is memorialized with a special [[headstone]] on the last floor of the [[Ice Queen's Realm]], placed next to Kathryn within the castle's innermost room.

==Generation==
Koa generated as peaceful. She was always generated in the [[Ice Queen's Realm]], occupying the square north of the upper fountain (which represented her "water bowl") at level creation.

Koa would revive at full HP and turn peaceful upon defeat.

==Origin==
Koa is based on the [[User:K2|EvilHack developer's]] beloved German Shepherd dog who passed away on November 29th, 2020, as indicated by the [[encyclopedia]] entry. In 2019, the developer promised his then-seven-year-old daughter Kathryn that he would add her and their dogs to EvilHack, and made them the bosses of a special branch.<ref>[https://github.com/k21971/EvilHack/commit/113aae435bc8823acc978097f99a19aaf9f3b2b1 New branch: The Ice Queen's Realm.]</ref>
